name: 1.1 - Induction and safety measures are in place, safe work method statement (SWMS) undertaken

Acceptance Criteria - All personnel on site have been inducted to the K Rd Project site and are informed of all relevant environmental management plans. Additionally, all necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, CEMP, TMP & SWMS
Reference Documents - Inductions Register/OH&S Co-Ordination Plan
Record of conformity - Site Induction Signed. SWMS Signed.
Acceptance Criteria - All relevant and/or applicable permits have been submitted and approved including details of all areas to be affected by works.

Acceptance Criteria - Survey activities undertaken to ensure all works meet level and location requirements. Establishment and integrity of the survey network shall be verified before commencing any survey and setout activity.
Record of conformity - Survey records & pegs on the ground

Acceptance Criteria - The finished surface of the river edge terrace shall conform with approved levels, lines and grades as shown on the drawings or as specified placement in accordance with section 210.

Acceptance Criteria - Supply of crushed rock bedding material is from one source and will not change without first advising the Company’s Representative and agreeing with them the volume of fill to be obtained from that source.
Acceptance Criteria - Granatic gravel used for river edge terrace meets project requirements (size, type and quality).
○ Material sample provided to client for rview and approval
Acceptance Criteria - Rock material used for river edge terrace meets project requirements (size, type and quality).
○ Material sample provided to client for rview and approval

Acceptance Criteria - Work affecting surrounding environment which is not pre-planned/approved in either Cultural heritage management plan (CHMP), Root Mapping Report, or Geotechnical reports is approved by client representative.
Reference Documents - CHMP, Root Mapping Report, Cliff stability Report, Geotechnical Report
Acceptance Criteria - Areas on which feature rocks & granetic gravel are to be placed shall be compacted and trimmed as required to provide a finished surface level in accordance with the drawings.
Acceptance Criteria - Geofabric to be placed on excavated surface, followed by 100mm (compacted) crushed rock bedding as per design drawings.
Acceptance Criteria - Feature rocks are placed as per design drawings.
Acceptance Criteria - Granatic gravel is placed as per drawings and spead to level at 50mm depth.
Acceptance Criteria - client sign off to confirm river rock terrace meets design and quality.
Acceptance Criteria - The installation has not negatively impacted the surrounding environment.
○ No signs of instability or erosion post installation.
The signature below veriﬁes that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and veriﬁes lot compliance with speciﬁcations.
